abstract: The company posted strong earnings in a brutal climate that has punished nearly every other retailer, both online and offline.
snippet: The company posted strong earnings in a brutal climate that has punished nearly every other retailer, both online and offline.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  In December, Amazon.com said it was having its “best ever” holiday season. On Thursday, it offered proof.

headline.main: Profit Rises at Amazon as Shoppers Seek Deals
headline.print_headline: Profit Rises At Amazon As Shoppers Seek Deals
